meanings.sent1: The unacknowledged truth finally came to light.
meanings.sent2: Her unacknowledged talent shone through in the performance.
meanings.sent3: The unacknowledged guest turned out to be the surprise entertainer.
meanings.sent4: His unacknowledged presence loomed large in the room.
meanings.sent5: The unacknowledged problem grew bigger with each passing day.

meanings.definition: Not having been thanked or recognized for something.
meanings.sent1: The unacknowledged efforts of the team led to their success.
meanings.sent2: She felt unacknowledged for her hard work on the project.
meanings.sent3: The unacknowledged hero quietly saved the day.
meanings.sent4: His unacknowledged kindness touched many hearts.
meanings.sent5: The unacknowledged volunteer made a significant impact on the community.
